CPSC110.name: Computation, Programs, and Programming
CPSC110.description: Fundamental program and computation structures. Introductory programming skills. Computation as a tool for information processing, simulation and modeling, and interacting with the world.

CPSC210.name: Software Construction
CPSC210.description: Design, development, and analysis of robust software components. Topics such as software design, computational models, data structures, debugging, and testing.

CPSC121.name: Models of Computation
CPSC121.description: Design, development, and analysis of robust software components. Topics such as software design, computational models, data structures, debugging, and testing.

CPSC213.name: Introduction to Computer Systems
CPSC213.description: Software architecture, operating systems, and I/O architectures. Relationships between application software, operating systems, and computing hardware; critical sections, deadlock avoidance, and performance; principles and operation of disks and networks.

CPSC221.name: Basic Algorithms and Data Structures
CPSC221.description: Design and analysis of basic algorithms and data structures; algorithm analysis methods, searching and sorting algorithms, basic data structures, graphs and concurrency.

CPSC304.name: Introduction to Relational Databases
CPSC304.description: Design, development, and analysis of robust software components. Topics such as software design, computational models, data structures, debugging, and testing.

CPSC313.name: Computer Hardware and Operating Systems
CPSC313.description: Instruction sets, pipelining, code optimization, caching, virtual memory management, dynamically linked libraries, exception processing, execution time of programs.

CPSC320.name: Intermediate Algorithm Design and Analysis
CPSC320.description: Systematic study of basic concepts and techniques in the design and analysis of algorithms, illustrated from various problem areas. Topics include: models of computation; choice of data structures; graph-theoretic, algebraic, and text processing algorithms.
